description: Futuristic luxury marketing website for the CoachDesk platform built as a standalone Next.js app with no backend integration.

userStories.title: Scaffold Next.js marketing app
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a dedicated Next.js + TypeScript app so the marketing site can be built independently of the existing Vite app.

next build succeeds for the marketing app
